about_the_game:
🏃‍♂️ Run, Swim, Jump, Extinguish and Push!

Dive into the thrilling action of FireHero, a pixel art game where you play as a courageous firefighter, determined to rescue civilians trapped in burning buildings!

Use the environment to your advantage and wield the tools at your disposal to overcome raging flames and reach the victims (including adorable cats!).

⛰️ Varied Biomes and Environments

Journey through diverse biomes, each with its own unique art style, ambiance, and gameplay challenges.

📦 Object Manipulation and Use

Use crates to navigate levels, from floating wooden crates for crossing water to heavy iron crates for solving underwater puzzles. Equip various tools, such as fire extinguishers and axes, to tackle fires and obstacles.

🌊 Water Level Control

Adjust water levels to access hard-to-reach platforms. Flood areas to extinguish fires or create water pathways to navigate through levels.

💰 Coin Collection / Star completion

Collect coins scattered throughout levels to unlock stars. Each star plays a role in your mission to save civilians and progress in the game.

🐱 Hidden Bonus Cats

Find and rescue hidden cats in every level to earn special stars. These felines friends add an extra challenge for the most dedicated players.

Additional Highlights

  • Pixel Art Graphics: Enjoy a retro visual style that blends classic charm with a vibrant, modern aesthetic.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: A unique combination of water management and object manipulation creates an engaging and varied experience.

  • Replayability: With coins to collect, stars to unlock, and hidden cats to save, there’s always a reason to explore and replay levels.

🔥 Are you ready to brave the flames and become a hero? 🔥

name: Fire Hero - Pixel Rescue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Fire Hero - Pixel Rescue is a 2D pixel art platformer where you play as a firefighter rescuing civilians and animals from burning buildings. You'll travel through different worlds and biomes, following a story with short dialogues that reveal the dramatic events your character is experiencing.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil
